attributes.action: Award John Surtees a posthumous Knighthood
attributes.background: John Surtees is the only person ever to have won both Formula One and Motorcycling World Championships. He was an icon to motorsport competitors and fans across the globe. These achievements plus his unwavering efforts to promote motorsport and support charity should be recognised with a Knighthood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
